parameters.name: EventScope
parameters.description:
The event scope. Valid values:

*   `INSTANCE`
*   `NAMESPACE`
*   `REPO`

Default value: `INSTANCE`

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The type of the event. Valid values:

*   `cr:Artifact:DeliveryChainCompleted`: The delivery chain is processed.
*   `cr:Artifact:SynchronizationCompleted`: The image is replicated.
*   `cr:Artifact:BuildCompleted`: The image is built.
*   `cr:Artifact:ScanCompleted`: The image is scanned.
*   `cr:Artifact:SigningCompleted`: The image is signed.

parameters.name: Namespaces
parameters.description: The namespaces to which the event notification rule applies.

parameters.name: RepoNames
parameters.description: The names of the repositories to which the event notification rule applies.

parameters.name: RepoTagFilterPattern
parameters.description: The regular expression for image tags.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the event notification rule.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the event notification rule.
